AUGUSTA, Maine —The Maine Center for Disease Control and Prevention reported 407 new COVID-19 cases on Thursday and no new deaths.
The number of Mainers with COVID-19 who have died remains at 246.

articles.title: Recall: Erectile Dysfunction, Depression Drugs Mixed Up - WebMD
articles.description: The recall involves the active ingredient in Viagra and an anti-depressant. They have been recalled because the drugs were "inadvertently packaged together" when they were bottled by a third-party vendor.
